s1.ptxt: Remove auto-on headlight sensor (1) located on the passenger side of the dashboard (2). Be careful not to damage the sensor (1) and dashboard by using rag (3).
Measure voltage between white wire terminal and black wire terminal at the following condition.
If measured voltage is out of specification, replace sensor.

spec.title: Auto-on headlight sensor voltage specifications
spec.ptxt: Cover the sensor lens with hand: 0.4 V
Light the sensor lens with incandescent lamp 100 W: 3 – 4.5 V
